headline: Seizing Her Chances Led To N.F.L.’s Biggest Stage
abstract: Sowers needed an assist to get her foot in the door. Then she burst through to become the first woman to coach in the N.F.L.’s championship game.
lead_paragraph: MIAMI — Katie Sowers did not come to the Super Bowl to be a token for the N.F.L., for the San Francisco 49ers, or for the news media. She came to coach.
